title: syscall: O_CLOEXEC ineffective on CentOS 5.5
body:
by **toeoso**: 
go 1.0.2 INSTALL OK , TEST ERROR:

ok      net/url 0.023s
ok      os      0.059s
--- FAIL: TestExtraFiles-4 (0.29 seconds)
        exec_test.go:158: Something already leaked - closed fd 3
        exec_test.go:199: CombinedOutput: exit status 1; output "leaked parent file. fd = 13; want 10
COMMAND     PID USER   FD   TYPE DEVICE    SIZE      NODE NAME
exec.test 25280 root  cwd    DIR  253,3    4096    239723 /usr/local/go/src/pkg/os/exec
exec.test 25280 root  rtd    DIR  253,0    4096         2 /
exec.test 25280 root  txt    REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root  mem    REG  253,0  139416    655684 /lib64/ld-2.5.so
exec.test 25280 root  mem    REG  253,0 1718120    655685 /lib64/libc-2.5.so
exec.test 25280 root  mem    REG  253,0  145824    655686 /lib64/libpthread-2.5.so
exec.test 25280 root    0r   CHR    1,3              1135 /dev/null
exec.test 25280 root    1w  FIFO    0,6         154648251 pipe
exec.test 25280 root    2w  FIFO    0,6         154648251 pipe
exec.test 25280 root    3u   REG   0,18      12 154648250 /tmp/879913196
exec.test 25280 root    4r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root    5r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root    6r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root    7r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root    8r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root    9r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root   10r   CHR    1,9               594 /dev/urandom
exec.test 25280 root   11u   REG   0,18      12 154648250 /tmp/879913196
exec.test 25280 root   12r   CHR    1,3              1135 /dev/null
exec.test 25280 root   13r   REG   0,18 4530152 154648013 /tmp/go-build052533059/os/exec/_test/exec.test
exec.test 25280 root   15r  FIFO    0,6         154648253 pipe
"
FAIL
FAIL    os/exec 0.454s
ok      os/signal       0.007s
ok      os/user 0.014s
ok      path    0.008s
